title: The verdict is in
author: VD
content_html: 15,500 new carry permits in Minnesota, and a grand total of two revoked for unlawful discharge of a firearm in the first year. Neither of the two permit-holders were actually shooting at anyone. So much for the Red Star’s predicted bloodbath.
content_text: 15,500 new carry permits in Minnesota, and a grand total of two revoked for unlawful discharge of a firearm in the first year.  Neither of the two permit-holders were actually shooting at anyone.  So much for the Red Star’s predicted bloodbath.
